4    | 
5    | 
6    | #ifndef _AGWPE_IF_H_
7    | #define _AGWPE_IF_H_
8    | 
9    | #include "ringbuf.h"
10   | #include "agwhdr.h"
11   | 
12   | #ifndef BYTE
13   | #define BYTE unsigned char
14   | #endif
15   | 
16   | /*--- Setup the TCP connection */
17   | int agw_tcp_init(char *address, char *port);
18   | 
19   | /*--- Close the TCP connection  ---*/
20   | void agw_tcp_close(void);
21   | 
22   | /*--- Send a command over TCP/IP connection to AGWPE  ---*/
23   | void agw_tcp_send(BYTE *data, size_t size);
24   | 
25   | /*--- Check if AGW header is available in the ring buffer  ---*/
26   | int agwhdr_available(RINGBUF *buf);
27   | 
28   | /*--- Get AGW header out of ring buffer  ---*/
29   | int agwhdr_get(RINGBUF *buf, AGWPE_HDR *hdr);
30   | 
31   | /*--- Get cnt data out of ring buffer and store it in array 'data' ---*/
32   | int agwdata_get(RINGBUF *ringbuf, size_t cnt, BYTE *data);
33   | 
34   | /*--- Get data from socket and store it in the ring buffer */
35   | void get_tcp_data(RINGBUF *buf);
36   | 
37   | 
38   | #endif
